oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Williams Mother's Best show - 1951-01-11 - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of Hank Williams' Mother's Best show, featuring Louis Buck (announcer), Hank Williams (performer, host), and Jerry Rivers (performer), on January 11, 1951 on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams; Jerry Rivers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Louis Buck) -- Opening theme -- Louis Buck talks -- Hank Williams introduces the first tune -- Alabama Waltz (Hank Williams) -- Hank Williams and Louis Buck talks -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Fire On The Mountain (Jerry Rivers fiddle) -- Hank Williams introduces the next tune -- Lord Build Me A Cabin (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Closing statements (Hank Williams and Louis Buck) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Buck, Louis, 1910-1971; Rivers, Jerry, 1928-; WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.);
